mapper.select: select t1.`id`,t1.`name`,t1.`sex`,t1.`bron`,t1.`address`,t1.`phone`,t2.`id` account_id,t2.`name` account_name,t2.`state` account_state,t2.`password` account_password,t3.`id` `account_role_id`,t3.`name` `account_role_name` from t_user t1 left join t_account t2 on t1.account_id=t2.id left join t_role t3 on t3.id =t2.role_id order by t1.id
